name: Starship XNBIO
overview: Starship XNBIO is a vertical scrolling shooter developed by Roberto Ricioppo using Chris Yates Shoot 'em Up Construction Kit in 2012. It was published by The New Dimension. Brief Game description/story: Mission briefing: An alien empire is setting an attack on the planet Zorz. Your mission is to fly through Starship XNBIO and infiltrate the entire army of aliens. Then get out alive. All aliens are armed with pulse laser beams. It's time to show them what you really think about their plans of an invasion to your home planet.
